pageTitle: Delta Autocorp IPO Date, Price, GMP, Review, Details
pageHeading: Delta Autocorp Limited IPO (Delta Autocorp IPO) Detail

lotSize.summary: Investors can bid for a minimum of 1000 shares and in multiples thereof. The following table depicts the minimum and maximum investment by Retail Investors and HNI in terms of shares and amount.

promoterHolding.promoters: Mr. Ankit Agarwal Mrs. Priyanka Agarwal and Mr. Sanwarmall Agarwalla are the promoters of the company.
promoterHolding.note: The value will be calculated using Equity Dilution = Share Holding Pre Issue - Share Holding Post Issue

about.details:
Incorporated in 2016, Delta Autocorp Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing and selling of 2-wheelers & 3-wheelers EVs.

The Company operates under the brand name "Deltic”. Initially concentrating on developing electric 3-wheelers prototypes, they marked a significant milestone in 2017 with the launch of their first E-Rickshaw, boasting an impressive mileage of over 150 Km.

After analysing market trends and changing customer preferences, the company expanded its product range to electric 2W vehicles. In 2018, prototype development began, and in 2019, the company launched affordable, durable scooters for tier-2 and tier-3 towns.

The company operates through a network of over 300 dealers across 25 states and Union Territories, focusing on B2B transactions. The goal is to become a global brand with cost-effective, practical products and excellent service.

Their Products:

  • Electric 2W scooters: Deltic Drixx, Deltic Trento
  • Electric 3W rickshaws: Deltic Star, Deltic Vayu
  • Electric 3W loaders
  • Electric 3W garbage carts
  • Spare parts and accessories for 2W and 3W vehicles: 3W Controller, 3W Motor

The company focuses on in-house product innovation through its R&D department in Uttar Pradesh, with 11 employees dedicated to designing electric vehicles based on customer needs and preferences.

As of 31 October 2024, the company has 139 employees.

Competitive Strength:

  • Experienced Promoters and Management Team
  • Customer Centric Approach
  • In house Research and Development of Products
  • Cracking the distribution model
  • Tapping into the mass premium segment
  • Quality Standard Certifications & Quality Tests
  • Diversified product range

contactDetails.full_address: Delta Autocorp Limited, Plot No 304 P, Pithakiarypost-Rupnarayanpur, Bardhaman

faqs.question: What is the Delta Autocorp IPO?
faqs.answer:
Delta Autocorp IPO is a SME IPO of 4200000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹54.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹130 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on January 7, 2025, and closes on January 9, 2025.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Delta Autocorp IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Delta Autocorp IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Delta Autocorp IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Delta Autocorp IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Delta Autocorp IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Delta Autocorp IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Delta Autocorp IPO opens on January 7, 2025 and closes on January 9, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Delta Autocorp IPO?
faqs.answer: Delta Autocorp IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,30,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Delta Autocorp IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Delta Autocorp IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Delta Autocorp IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Delta Autocorp IPO will be done on Friday, January 10, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, January 13, 2025. Check the Delta Autocorp IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Delta Autocorp IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Delta Autocorp IPO listing date is on Tuesday, January 14, 2025.
